snippet: Durant, last season’s most valuable player, returned from a foot injury, but Oklahoma City lost to the Pelicans in New Orleans.
abstract: NBA Roundup; New Orleans Pelicans beat Oklahoma City Thunder, 112-104, despite Thunder star forward Kevin Durant's return from foot injury; other basketball results and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Durant, last season’s most valuable player, returned from a foot injury, but Oklahoma City lost to the Pelicans in New Orleans.

headline.main: Kevin Durant Debuts With 27 Points, but Thunder Fall
headline.print_headline: Durant Makes Debut, but Thunder Fall
